content.mainInfo: This is a popular kiteboarding area for beginners and a training spot for several kite schools. Shallow water and a sandy bottom make it ideal for the beginner to expert kiteboarder.
content.proTip: You can drive on the beach, but don't get stuck!

content.mainInfo: Blue Mountain is an ski resort just northwest of Collingwood. Blue Mountain is an alpine ski resort in Ontario, Canada, just northwest of Collingwood.
